resources.string: This was the first live concert I\'ve attended, and it was well worth the wait time. I enjoyed many of the songs, and have been looking forward to the new songs he teased at the concert. It was a possibly once in a lifetime opportunity, and with great luck that I discovered him in time to explore his discography in its entirety.

My Camaro is a hand-me-down from my dad. It means a lot to me just because it was my dad\'s. He\'s taught me to do a lot of the maintenance on it so that I can save money doing things like oil changes and changing tires myself.

I met so many of my favorite friends at Smash club, the drawing being a creation of one of them. I struggled in being close to anyone throughout as well freshman and sophomore years. Smash club was that ice-breaker and it was an impulsive go-to after seeing my one of my now-best friend\'s shameless plugs in a discord server. Meeting my friends and any moments we have together will always be a part of my favorite memories.
must be 8 chars (can be alphanumeric)\nstart with upper case\ncontains a number
must be 5 chars (can be alphanumeric), all lowercase
